description: This source file defines a Flutter page for creating a booking, including UI elements for selecting dates, displaying room information, and handling form submission.

classes.name: BookingCreateArgs
classes.description: A data class carrying a Room object for creating bookings.

classes.name: BookingCreatePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the booking creation page.

classes.name: _BookingCreatePageState
classes.description: State class for BookingCreatePage managing form state, date picking, and submission logic.

classes.name: _NoRoomPassed
classes.description: A widget displayed when no room data is passed to the booking page.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Prompts the user to select a date for check-in or check-out, updating the state accordingly.

methods.name: _fmt
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a string or returns 'Select date' if null.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the submission of the booking form, including calling the booking service and managing UI states.
